title: 3.19- The Massacre of the Champ de Mars
itunes:title: 3.19- The Massacre of the Champ de Mars
description:
After the Flight to Varennes, populist agistators in Paris called for an end to the monarchy, leading to a bloody confrontation in July 1791.

Coming Dec 14: revolutionspodcastfundraiser.com
